name: Highway Rush
description:
Break the rules at the highway, and race!
in high way racer you must survive infinite amount of the upcoming car avoid them record high scores and much more!

you have multiple car types and must avoid each other like the : ambulance, taxi, normal car, police, black viper(racing car), and more!

Rules :
1 - Choose your difficulty in the settings
2 - W,S,A and D or arrow keys for moving
3 - Avoid upcoming waves of cars
4 - Most important, Enjoy!
